A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are\, undoubtedly\, some issues with this movie\, but that does little to take away from the fact that it is a fantastic film. Being an entry into the Star Wars universe comes with expectations that are very difficult to live up to. And\, other than a few questionable twists\, and a the fact that it's about 20 minutes too long\, this is an amazing feat of film making. Overall I's give The Last Jedi a 4 out of 5 and a 7.5 out of 10. Bring on 'Solo'!
